job.title: Data Entry/Analyst
job.description: <p><strong>Must Haves:</strong></p><ul><li>1-3 years data analysis experience </li><li>Manipulating data lists, analyzing and re-analyzing data, pulling data from other sources, etc.</li><li>Microsoft Office applications (MS Word, Excel) – must know basic data manipulation </li><li>Pivot Tables and Vlookups are a nice to have</li><li>Ability to work under pressure and move fast</li><li>Strong attention to detail</li><li>Team mentality, lots of juggling, team work </li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Pluses:</strong></p><ul><li>Proficient with building <strong>GMC</strong> and/or <strong>Fusion Pro</strong> work flows</li><li>Experience with working with a postal software – <strong>First Logic</strong></li></ul><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Day to day:</strong></p><ul><li>Work with internal clients (3 assigned account reps) that give requirements and job instructions </li><li>Budget coordination, proofs, sign offs, data analysis in a 24-hr window</li><li>Receive day to day direction from Individual Auto Account Executive </li><li>Ability to comprehend written and/or verbal job instructions</li><li>Works with postal software (i.e. First Logic) to perform USPS data hygiene (i.e. CASS, merge, purge, etc.) </li><li>Ability to work in various data management software environments </li><li>Manipulates data based on client requirements</li><li>Provides proofs to internal client</li><li>Prepares jobs for production floor</li><li>Assists internal client with information pertaining to their jobs</li><li>Provides various data counts</li><li>Proficient with building GMC and/or Fusion Pro work flows </li><li>Strong attention to detail &amp; accuracy</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>
